title: University English Speaking Enhancement Course Based on TBLT (Task-Based Language Teaching) for Science Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate English communication skills and basic practical experience in scientific fields
context.additional_context: Aims to enhance English speaking skills required in workplace environments for science professionals, applying Task-Based Language Teaching (TBLT) for practical, task-centered education.

learning_goals: Enhancing the ability to deliver English presentations lasting 5 minutes or more in practical science-related work scenarios
Securing the ability to engage in English discussions on complex topics arising during collaboration with peer practitioners
Cultivating natural English communication skills through scenario-based role-playing that mimics real-world work environments

resources: English Language Textbooks for Science Subjects

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
